name: Alton D. BROWN, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, and John Wetzel (Secretary of PA Dept. of Corrections), Appellees
name_abbreviation: Brown v. PA Dept. of Corrections

parties: Alton D. BROWN, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, and John Wetzel (Secretary of PA Dept. of Corrections), Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of August, 2013, the appeal is dismissed due to appellant’s failure to pay the requisite filing fee.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
73 A.3d 577
Alton D. BROWN, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS, and John Wetzel (Secretary of PA Dept. of Corrections), Appellees.
No. 52 MAP 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 23, 2013.
